name: Gcore CDN
author: Gcore

sections.description:
With Gcore’s WordPress CDN plugin, you can easily connect your website to Gcore CDN service without additional effort. It simplifies the management of links to your static content that should be cached via CDN.

FEATURES

With the Gcore WordPress CDN plugin, you can:
* Select the type of files you want to cache: images, video, audio, JS, CSS, or archive.
* Specify the exact file extension of files you want to cache.
* Narrow your selection by choosing the folder (by name or URL) within your WordPress website.
* Create exceptions for files that shouldn’t be cached, specifying their URLs.

HOW IT WORKS

  1. Sign in to your Gcore account
  2. Create a new CDN resource
  3. Install the plugin on your WordPress site
  4. Specify the domain in the plugin
  5. Set type/folder/exceptions for caching files

As a result, your website visitors will enjoy a faster and more responsive browsing experience. Our CDN plugin is a simple way to optimize your website’s performance, ensuring that your content will be delivered to your audience in the most efficient way.

Author

  • Gcore
